name: Parking King
description:
Drive the car and park to the parking area.
Challenge parking to various locations.

[Features]
- You can experience many patterns of parking by providing many stages.
- Use the shield item to protect your car.
- Various camera viewpoint supported: third person point view & first-person point view
- Challenge mode supported: improve your parking ability
- Multiplayer supported: compete with other users.
- 16 languages supported
- Leaderboard and Achievement supported
- Tablet device supported
- fun game, free game, no wifi, no internet
